description: Aspose.Tasks for .NET is a .NET Project management component that enables .NET applications to not only read and manipulate Microsoft Project documents in MPP and XML formats but to also write Microsoft Project documents in MPP or Project XML format - all without using Microsoft Project.
releaseNotes:
Bugs

TASKS-14448 - MPP resource assignments timephased data reads incorrectly.
TASKS-33142 - [Outline Number] Outline number is always null
TASKS-33145 - [MPP] Incorrect tasks' start dates
TASKS-33158 - [MSP 2003] Tasks' data is incorrect when reading from MPP file
TASKS-33236 - Resource assignment work no longer matches when exporting data
TASKS-33237 - Incorrect Start, End dates reading from MPP 2003 file.
TASKS-33239 - Possible regression problem 4.8.0
TASKS-33240 - Exception while export MPP to PDF.
TASKS-33242 - Issue with CHM file Programmer's guide section
TASKS-33243 - Tasks start/finish dates removed when task duration changed by dragging in the Gantt Chart
TASKS-33244 - Cannot open MPP to XML export result.
TASKS-33246 - Saving a Project two times corrupts the project file and freezes application
TASKS-33255 - Cannot read/write Assignment.Baseline.RscCostPerUse field in mpp 2003 files
TASKS-33256 - Cannot read Task.Baseline.FixedCost field in mpp 2010 files
TASKS-33257 - Arithmetic operation resulted in an overflow, Exception while opening the MPP
TASKS-33258 - Incorrect summary tasks rendering when saving project file to pdf or image

Enhancement
TASKS-15758 - Calculate BCWS, BCWP, ACWP, CV values when read data from MPP files
summary: Aspose.Tasks for .NET is a component to work with Project files
title: Aspose.Tasks for .NET
